description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bounce, jump, smash and munch across the colourful world of Bopscotch! Challenge ninety fiendish levels solo in adventure mode, or take on a friend in head-to-head race mode!
description.short: Bounce, jump, smash and munch across the colourful world of Bopscotch! Challenge ninety fiendish levels solo in adventure mode, or take on a friend in head-to-head race mode!
